hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime Altcoin Momentum Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes (confidence >55%), when a top-10 crypto by market cap (excluding BTC/ETH) experiences a 3-day RSI(14) drop below 30 followed by a single-day >8% price surge on above-average volume, it will continue to outperform the Crypto Total Market Index (TMI) by >5% over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often feature rotational flows rather than broad trends. Extreme oversold conditions in major alts during these periods can signal capitulation, with subsequent surges indicating renewed institutional/smart money interest that tends to persist for several days as momentum builds.
entry_conditions: Asset in [SOL, AVAX, DOGE, ADA, DOT, LINK, MATIC, UNI, XRP]
Day 4: Price increase >8% on volume >20% above 20-day MA
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Mean excess return vs TMI ≤0% over 5 days across >100 historical instances in neutral regimes.
